instructions: Image titled Delete a Jobcase Account Step 1 1 Open a web browser on your computer, phone, or tablet. You can use any web browser, such as Chrome, Safari, Firefox, or Edge. Image titled Delete a Jobcase Account Step 2 2 Navigate to https://www.jobcase.com/contact . A contact form will appear. Image titled Delete a Jobcase Account Step 3 3 Enter the name and email address attached to your Jobcase account. Image titled Delete a Jobcase Account Step 4 4 Select from the drop-down menu. Image titled Delete a Jobcase Account Step 5 5 Type your request into the Message box. You ll want to be specific and request that Jobcase deletes your account from their system. Examples: Please delete my Jobcase account as I no longer use the service. I would like to request that my Jobcase account be deleted. Image titled Delete a Jobcase Account Step 6 6 Click or tap . It s the blue button at the bottom of the form. A customer service representative at Jobcase will delete your account from the system. Advertisement
